      in: "query",
      name: "average_work_day",

    },
    {
      in: "query",
      name: "genre_parent_tag",

    },
    {
      in: "query",
      name: "instruments_parent_tag",

      name: "mood_parent_tag",
      schema: { type: "string" },

    },

      in: "query",
      name: "order_by",

        enum: ["created_at", "hit", "recommend_order", "tag_count"],

      in: "query",

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{
    "200": {
      content: {
        "application/json": {
          schema: {
            type: "object",
            properties: {
              count: { type: "number", nullable: false },
              cursor: { type: "string", nullable: true },
              results: {
                type: "array",
                items: {
                  type: "object",
                  properties: {
                    id: { type: "integer", readOnly: true },
                    nickname: { type: "string", title: "아티스트 닉네임", maxLength: 30 },
                    profile: { type: "string", title: "유저 프로필" },
                    introduction: { type: "string", title: "소개글", maxLength: 1000 },
                    status: {
                      enum: ["OFFLINE", "ONLINE", "VACATION"],
                      type: "string",
                      description: "* `ONLINE` - Online\n* `OFFLINE` - Offline\n* `VACATION` - 휴가중",
                      "x-spec-enum-id": "de0d4d4e19985b7f",
                      title: "활동 상태",
                      "x-enumNames": ["Offline", "Online", "휴가중"],
                    },
                    instrumentsSet: {
                      type: "array",
                      items: {
                        type: "object",
                        properties: {
                          id: { type: "integer" },
                          nameEn: { type: "string", readOnly: true, title: "영어 이름" },
                          nameKr: { type: "string", readOnly: true, title: "한글 이름" },
                          parent: {
                            allOf: [
                              {
                                type: "object",
                                properties: {
                                  id: { type: "integer", readOnly: true },
                                  nameEn: { type: "string", readOnly: true, title: "영어 이름" },
                                  nameKr: { type: "string", readOnly: true, title: "한글 이름" },
                                },
                                required: ["id", "nameEn", "nameKr"],
                                title: "ArtistParentInstruments",
                              },
                            ],
                            readOnly: true,
                          },
                        },
                        required: ["id", "nameEn", "nameKr", "parent"],
                        title: "ArtistInstruments",
                      },
                      title: "작업분야",
                    },
                    genreSet: {
                      type: "array",
                      items: {
                        type: "object",
                        properties: {
                          id: { type: "integer" },
                          nameEn: { type: "string", readOnly: true, title: "영어 이름" },
                          nameKr: { type: "string", readOnly: true, title: "한글 이름" },
                        },
                        required: ["id", "nameEn", "nameKr"],
                        title: "ArtistGenre",
                      },
                      title: "genre",
                    },
                    moodSet: {
                      type: "array",
                      items: {
                        type: "object",
                        properties: {
                          id: { type: "integer" },
                          nameEn: { type: "string", readOnly: true, title: "영어 이름" },
                          nameKr: { type: "string", readOnly: true, title: "한글 이름" },
                        },
                        required: ["id", "nameEn", "nameKr"],
                        title: "ArtistMood",
                      },
                      title: "mood",
                    },
                    styleSet: {
                      type: "array",
                      items: {
                        type: "object",
                        properties: {
                          id: { type: "integer" },
                          nameEn: { type: "string", readOnly: true, title: "영어 이름" },
                          nameKr: { type: "string", readOnly: true, title: "한글 이름" },
                        },
                        required: ["id", "nameEn", "nameKr"],
                        title: "ArtistStyle",
                      },
                      title: "style",
                    },
                    isFollowing: { type: "boolean", title: "팔로잉 여부" },
                    averageStar: { type: "number", format: "double", default: 0, readOnly: true, title: "평균 별점" },
                    totalReviewCnt: { type: "integer", default: 0, title: "총 리뷰 수" },
                    followers: { type: "integer", title: "팔로워수" },
                    tagCount: { type: "integer", title: "테스트" },
                  },
                  required: [
                    "averageStar",
                    "followers",
                    "genreSet",
                    "id",
                    "instrumentsSet",
                    "introduction",
                    "isFollowing",
                    "moodSet",
                    "nickname",
                    "profile",
                    "styleSet",
                    "tagCount",
                  ],
                  title: "Artist",
                },
              },
            },
            title: "PaginatedArtistList",
          },
        },
      },
      description: "",
    },
    "401": {
      content: {
        "application/json": {
          schema: {
            type: "object",
            properties: { detail: { type: "string" } },
            required: ["detail"],
            title: "CommonError",
          },
        },
      },
      description: "",
    },

      content: {
        "application/json": {
          schema: {
            type: "object",
